title: Ostrich Haul
description: Be an Ostrich and jump over obstacles

title: Word Search
description: A puzzle game where you find words hidden in a grid.

title: Crossword
description: A word puzzle that takes the form of a rectangular grid of white and black shaded squares.

title: Minesweeper
description: A puzzle game where you clear a board containing hidden mines.

title: GoGoBird
description: An action game where you control a bird to avoid obstacles.
